item.title: Getting Started How To Start Programming
item.description: How to start programing Basic list of topics Basic Syntax Data Types Variables Keywords Basic Operators Decision-Making Loops while loops for loops Numbers Math Arrays Dictionay/key Value pairs think working with json data in its simplest form.

item.title: Getting Started I want to learn DevOps
item.description: I want to learn DevOps DevOps Manifesto DevOps is the union of people, process, and products to enable continuous delivery of value to our end users.

item.title: Getting started in the world of Infosec
item.description: The world of Infosec "No sugar coating it!" Getting started - if you could hire me that would be great! So let’s be honest, getting started is a bit of misnomer.
